item.title: The journey to be a solid developer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Being a solid developer doesn’t mean to only know a programming language(s) very well, or mastering the latest cool framework. It’s more than that. It’s not just about code, it’s also about people around you, the community, the tools and approaches. In this closing keynote we will share our personal experiences. And of course the […]
item.content:encoded: Being a solid developer doesn’t mean to only know a programming language(s) very well, or mastering the latest cool framework. It’s more than that. It’s not just about code, it’s also about people around you, the community, the tools and approaches. In this closing keynote we will share our personal experiences. And of course the journey is not over yet.
